frontmatter.author: Žan Mervič
frontmatter.title: Orange Fairness - Dataset Bias
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: Orange now supports methods for detecting and mitigating bias in machine learning.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: In an era where AI drives decisions impacting real lives, fairness in machine learning is paramount. Take the `Adult` dataset, which shows discrepancies in salary predictions based on gender. Addressing such concerns, Orange introduces a fairness add-on. Using new widgets, users can identify and mitigate biases in their datasets or model predictions.
